title: Evergreen (Big Cats & WWF, grown)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Evergreens were trees planted during the Big Cats & WWF event as part of the Amur leopard habitat restoration. First, pine tree seeds would be obtained from already grown evergreens. At the planting area, the stump would first be cleared to create an empty patch. Then, the pine tree seeds could then be planted and grow over several hours. The trees could become diseased and cured by pruning with secateurs, and otherwise would die. After fully grown, the "Get xp" option could be used to receive 284.5 Farming experience. 7 trees had to be fully grown to complete the event.

Evergreens were trees planted during the Big Cats & WWF event as part of the Amur leopard habitat restoration. First, pine tree seeds would be obtained from already grown evergreens. At the planting area, the stump would first be cleared to create an empty patch. Then, the pine tree seeds could then be planted and grow over several hours. The trees could become diseased and cured by pruning with secateurs, and otherwise would die. After fully grown, the "Get xp" option could be used to receive 284.5 Farming experience. 7 trees had to be fully grown to complete the event.

Growth stages[edit | edit source]

StageImageDiseasedDead
1N/AN/A
2
3
4
5N/AN/A

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The planting area and seedling stages both have no visible model.

'''Evergreens''' were trees planted during the [[Big Cats & WWF]] event as part of the Amur leopard habitat restoration. First, [[pine tree seed]]s would be obtained from already grown [[Evergreen (Big Cats & WWF)|evergreens]]. At the planting area, the stump would first be cleared to create an empty patch. Then, the pine tree seeds could then be planted and grow over several hours. The trees could become diseased and cured by pruning with [[secateurs]], and otherwise would die. After fully grown, the "Get xp" option could be used to receive 284.5 [[Farming]] experience. 7 trees had to be fully grown to complete the event.

==Growth stages==
